      Fields in org.apache.lucene.spatial.query declared as SpatialOperation 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static SpatialOperation SpatialOperation.BBoxIntersects
      Bounding box of the *indexed* shape, then Intersects.
      static SpatialOperation SpatialOperation.BBoxWithin
      Bounding box of the *indexed* shape, then IsWithin.
      static SpatialOperation SpatialOperation.Contains
      Meets the "Covers" OGC definition (boundary-neutral).
      static SpatialOperation SpatialOperation.Intersects
      Meets the "Intersects" OGC definition.
      static SpatialOperation SpatialOperation.IsDisjointTo
      Meets the "Disjoint" OGC definition.
      static SpatialOperation SpatialOperation.IsEqualTo
      Meets the "Equals" OGC definition.
      static SpatialOperation SpatialOperation.IsWithin
      Meets the "CoveredBy" OGC definition (boundary-neutral).
      static SpatialOperation SpatialOperation.Overlaps
      Almost meets the "Overlaps" OGC definition, but boundary-neutral (boundary==interior).
